content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Polish Version is available here:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"attachment\",\"data\":{\"size\":57808,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4dd7370e-059f-4d4e-a275-a8586912d9bf/Poland - Polish - Contractors EPAM Privacy Notice.docx\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4dd7370e-059f-4d4e-a275-a8586912d9bf/Poland - Polish - Contractors EPAM Privacy Notice.docx\",\"fileName\":\"Poland - Polish - Contractors EPAM Privacy Notice.docx\",\"name\":\"Poland - Polish - Contractors EPAM Privacy Notice.docx\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"attachment\",\"id\":\"4dd7370e-059f-4d4e-a275-a8586912d9bf\",\"extension\":\"docx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Systems (Poland) sp. z o.o. with its registered office at Kraków, Opolska 114, 31-323 Kraków, NIP 6751458027, registered in the Commercial Register maintained by the Comercial Court for Kraków-Śródmieście, XI Commercial Division under KRS No. 0000390124 (“EPAM”) is committed to protecting the privacy and security of your personal information.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This privacy notice describes how we collect and use personal information about you when you are providing services to EPAM, in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation 2016 (“GDPR”). \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You are receiving this privacy notice because you will be providing services to EPAM as an independent contractor, as a member of the personnel of our service provider or as an individual cooperating with EPAM on the basis of a civil law agreement, training or apprenticeship agreement. This is separate to any privacy notice you have already received about any recruitment or application process or the general privacy notice for general use of our corporate websites. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We may update this notice at any time.  Where we can, we will notify applicants of substantial changes to the privacy notice.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is a \\\"data controller\\\". This means that we are responsible for deciding how we hold and use personal information about you. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are required under data protection legislation to notify you of the information contained in this privacy notice. It is important that you read this notice so that you are aware of how and why we use your personal data. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
